BR_text.BRsummary: Cannot load the PTC dataset via dgl.data.GINDataset
BR_text.BRdescription:
Hi,
 I encountered a bug when loading the PTC dataset through <denchmark-link:https://docs.dgl.ai/api/python/data.html#dgl.data.GINDataset>dgl.data.GINDataset</denchmark-link>
 . My dgl version is 0.4.3post2.
 Please see the screenshot:
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38380341/90885126-94197880-e3e3-11ea-816f-308fe6269e30.png></denchmark-link>
 
 Thank you!

comments_0.comment_text: Confirmed the bug still exisits in v0.5

comments_1.comment_text:
Hi,
 I made a fix at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmlc/dgl/pull/2103>#2103</denchmark-link>
 . I checked with the original author's the relabeling process should happen all the time. The error is due to the labels are non-contiguous.
 However, if we strictly follow the preprocessing there, the result of MUTAG would be changed (the labels will be relabeled, however this shouldn't change the final result). Therefore I did a slight change to avoid that, which you can find the comment in the codes

comments_2.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/VoVAllen>@VoVAllen</denchmark-link>
  Hi,
 Thank you very much for your help!
